statements: SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, diversity_ranking, inclusion_score FROM supplier_diversity_metrics;
SELECT * FROM supplier_diversity_metrics WHERE diversity_ranking > 5;
SELECT supplier_name, inclusion_score FROM supplier_diversity_metrics WHERE inclusion_score < 0.5;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier_diversity_metrics ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_diversity_metrics ORDER BY inclusion_score ASC, diversity_ranking DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_diversity_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, diversity_ranking FROM supplier_diversity_metrics WHERE inclusion_score > 0.8 ORDER BY diversity_ranking DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, inclusion_score FROM supplier_diversity_metrics WHERE diversity_ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_diversity_metrics ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, diversity_ranking DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, inclusion_score FROM supplier_diversity_metrics WHERE diversity_ranking > 2 AND inclusion_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers;
SELECT id, location, name FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, diversity_score FROM suppliers ORDER BY diversity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_metrics WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE diversity_score > 3.50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT s.name, sm.year, sm.diversity_index FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_metrics sm ON s.id = sm.supplier_id WHERE sm.year = 2021 AND sm.diversity_index >= 4.00;

SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, sm.inclusion_index AS index_value FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_metrics sm ON s.id = sm.supplier_id WHERE sm.inclusion_index < 3.00 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, index_value DESC;

SELECT s.id, s.name, sm.year, sm.diversity_index, sm.inclusion_index FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_metrics sm ON s.id = sm.supplier_id WHERE sm.year IN (2020, 2021) AND sm.diversity_index BETWEEN 2.50 AND 4.00 ORDER BY s.id ASC, sm.year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, diversity_score FROM Suppliers ORDER BY diversity_score DESC;
SELECT contact_id, contact_name, email FROM SupplierContacts WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM InclusionMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers JOIN InclusionMetrics ON Suppliers.supplier_id = InclusionMetrics.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.supplier_id = 1;
SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, InclusionMetrics.metric_name FROM Suppliers JOIN InclusionMetrics ON Suppliers.supplier_id = InclusionMetrics.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.diversity_score > 0.5;

SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, SupplierContacts.contact_name, SupplierContacts.email FROM Suppliers LEFT JOIN SupplierContacts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierContacts.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.supplier_id = 2;

SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, InclusionMetrics.metric_name, SupplierContacts.contact_name FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN InclusionMetrics ON Suppliers.supplier_id = InclusionMetrics.supplier_id INNER JOIN SupplierContacts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierContacts.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.diversity_score < 0.3;
SELECT SupplierContacts.contact_name, SupplierContacts.phone_number FROM SupplierContacts JOIN Suppliers ON SupplierContacts.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.diversity_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_type FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, diversity_score FROM Suppliers WHERE diversity_score > 80;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_type FROM Suppliers;

SELECT supplier_name, metric_name, value FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierMetrics ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierMetrics.supplier_id JOIN DiversityMetrics ON SupplierMetrics.metric_id = DiversityMetrics.metric_id;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_type FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiversityMetrics WHERE target_value > 0.5;
SELECT s.supplier_name, d.metric_name, sm.value FROM Suppliers s JOIN SupplierMetrics sm ON s.supplier_id = sm.supplier_id JOIN DiversityMetrics d ON sm.metric_id = d.metric_id;
SELECT s.supplier_name, sc.contact_name, sc.email FROM Suppliers s JOIN SupplierContacts sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.supplier_id WHERE sc.phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_suppliers FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Hardware';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_diversity_status FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT sc.category_name, s.supplier_name FROM Suppliers s JOIN SupplierCategoryMapping scm ON s.supplier_id = scm.supplier_id JOIN SupplierCategories sc ON scm.category_id = sc.category_id;
SELECT sm.metric_name, sm.metric_value FROM SupplierMetrics sm WHERE sm.metric_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Raw Material'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_diversity_status = 'Diverse'
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contacts FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierContacts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierContacts.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_location FROM Suppliers
